data.message: There it all goes trial after trial I'll give you the proper way to say memorize the steps of sorry defined by the way a lost and related in troubles of why and when did that happen was maybe something we could push back in time with a few more laughs the day is still young maybe I'll find the right words  to deliver to the hearts of each person that knows I was in the wrong I can't write so I'll just say my words were held down can't even run please let the grip of each detail be the rust turn shine come visit this in a later day then remember young moments were far from dumb     take dipped  into the crust baked with a plate almost done
